profile.title: Profile
profile.content: Software developer with a degree in Computer Engineering, experienced in web application development, knowledgeable in REST API development, and passionate about staying abreast of emerging technologies.

timeline.title: University of the Americas - (UDLA)
timeline.text: I studied Computer Engineering at the University of the Americas, where I learned to develop web applications.

secondTimeline.title: Software Developer
secondTimeline.text: I worked at an e-commerce company as a software developer, where I faced and overcame many challenges.

thirdTimeline.title: Software Developer - Fullstack
thirdTimeline.subtitle: Coming Soon...
thirdTimeline.text: Seeking my next professional challenge as a software developer.
